page.name: Attack of the Pirates!
page.description: The pirates of Sho Nuff Island are attacking the Shadow of the Wind Village. Thyton has asked you to defend the town against the invaders while a large party of ninjas attack the pirate town.

properties.name: Attack of the Pirates!
properties.description: The pirates of Sho Nuff Island are attacking the Shadow of the Wind Village. Thyton has asked you to defend the town against the invaders while a large party of ninjas attack the pirate town.
properties.complete: You have defeated this wave of pirates, but more and more keep pouring out of the sea to attack! How long do you think you can hold them off?
